short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickDesk Lite is a powerful Sales Extension to your ActiveCampaign Account for the sales team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features: 
📞*Outbound Calling: 
You can click to call and make an outbound call easily

🎙️*Call recording: 
You may record the calls to improve business efficiency and productivity by ensuring that important conversations are not forgotten, allowing for better communication, improved customer service, and conflict resolution. 

🗨️*Send message to your client: 
Click to send a message to your contacts via Whatsapp or SMS, and you will receive notifications once they reply. You can also directly make a follow-up texting with your clients right after your call. 

Benefits: 
🤩*User-Friendly interface: A chrome extension allows your sales team to see all your past conversations (whatsapp, call, email) with your contact in one place 
💪*Team collaboration: Enhance your remote sales team performance by giving them access to make a call from the browser no matter where they are.
🔥*Ensure quality customer experience: Keep your organization connected with the clients by tracking previous interactions activity and maintain accurate notes for later refer

Contact us📣if any inquiries at contact@quickdesk.io
